title: University of Arts London
description: This site provides access to research, teaching and learning outputs of the University of the Arts London. The university consists of six colleges: London College of Fashion, Central Saint Martins College of Art and Design, Chelsea College of Art and Design, London College of Communication, Wimbledon College of Art, and Camberwell College of Arts. The university specialises in Visual Arts, Design, Media and Communication, Fashion, Architecture: History, Theory & Practice, Art Theory & Practice, Cultural Policy, Arts management and the creative industries, Dance Studies, Sound, Conservation, Pedagogy, Journalism, Performance, Drama and Theatre Studies.
